name: Single Page Application UI
description: (Professional) As the team leader I helped create the complete UI for a large distributed data protection application. Written in JavaScript the UI utilizes the application API which I also played a key role in designing.

name: Application SDK and CI
description: (Professional) I am the key developer and maintainer of the SDK. Written in Python and used by customers and our own Automation engineers. I have also been involved in championing consistency in and improvements to our CI solution.

name: Ludum Dare 49: Shields Down
description:
Ludum Date 49 entry.  
Based on the theme *Unstable*.

name: Mega-lo-Mania Game
description:
Clone of the Mega-lo-Mania by Sensible Software (1991).  
Using Phaser 3 a JavaScript game engine.

name: Supremacy Game
description:
Clone of the Supremacy by Probe Software (1990).  
Using React and Recoil.

name: Sorcerer's Cave Game
description:
Clone of the board game Sorcerer's Cave by Terence Peter Donnelly (1978).  
Using React.
